item.title: 让wireshark以非root权限运行背后的linux Capabilities
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: sudo setcap "CAP_NET_ADMIN=+ep" /bin/ip sudo setcap cap_net_raw,cap_net_admin=eip /usr/sbin/tcpdump sudo setcap cap_net_raw,cap_net_admin+eip /usr/bin/dumpcap sudo setcap cap_net_raw,cap_net_admin,cap_net_bind_service+eip /usr/local/bin/nmap sudo setcap cap_net_raw+eip $(eval readlink -f $(which node)) sudo setcap 'cap_net_bind_service=+ep' $(which caddy) 0x1 加入linux Capabilities的背景知识 Linux是一种安全操作系统，它
